p.span: Click HERE to read our statement about the final day of this school year. Click HERE to read our most current communication about off-site school, distance learning plans, and food distribution thru the end of the school year. We are missing all of you dearly!
Click HERE to see a video message of love from all of us to all of our sweet kiddos.

a.title: Go to comments for tps statement on coronavirus

p.span: Click HERE to access our ongoing archive of online resources, divided into categories, good for this time of distance learning, and throughout the year.

a.title: Go to comments for online resources for home learning and activity

p.span: We have exciting opportunities for creative, visionary educators for the upcoming school! We are also currently seeking an instructional assistant to join our current school year team. Click HERE to learn more about the positions, and to follow application instructions.

a.title: Go to comments for positions available

span.strong: renovation bid proposals now being accepted

p.span: TPS invites interested and qualified contractors to subit a bid for the renovation of our new auxiliary classroom space on South Washington Street. Interested contractors should CLICK HERE to learn about the project, qualification requirements, deadlines and contact information.

a.title: Go to comments for invitation to bid on renovation

span.strong: notice of rfp for food service

p.span: Notice is hereby given, The Project School (TPS) in Bloomington, Indiana will received sealed proposals until 8a EST on Monday, May 4, 2020. Submit proposals to: Attn Kristin Blackwell, The Project School, 349 South Walnut Street, Bloomington, IN, 47401. TPS reserves the right to negotiate at its discretion with those submitting proposals, in accordance with Indiana law. Sealed proposals are being sough for the following items: FOOD OPERATION & MANAGEMENT SERVICES. Detailed specifications are on file at TPS at 349 South Walnut Street, Bloomington, Indiana, 47401.

a.title: Go to comments for food service rfp

div.p: February 1, 2020 -- The Herald Times ran a story about TPS expansion.

a.title: Go to comments for Herald Times Covers TPS Expansion

div.p: January 23, 2020 -- TPS has signed a lease for an adjacent building which will allow the addition of 3 classrooms over 3 years.

a.title: Go to comments for TPS Announces Expansion for Fall 2020

img.alt: TPS Teacher Publishes in Peer-Reviewed Early Childhood Journal

a.span: TPS Teacher Publishes in Peer-Reviewed Early Childhood Journal

div.p: January 7, 2020 -- Ms. Doriet Berkowitz, TPS Lead Teacher, recently published an article on children's indentities in NAEYC'S peer-reviewed journal.

a.title: Go to comments for TPS Teacher Publishes in Peer-Reviewed Early Childhood Journal

div.p: December 3, 2019 -- The year-long housing and sustainability project of the middle school was highlighted in the Herald Times.

a.title: Go to comments for Project:Place Featured in the HT
